price: 29. Asilaki kobungisa ngai mpe atiye ngai mosika na bokundoli tango eyelaki ngai (kurani). Kasi ya sólo, penza satana azali mokosi mpo na moto, (akimaka moto o sima ya komeka ye mpe kobungisa ye).
arabic: لَّقَدۡ أَضَلَّنِي عَنِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَنِيۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: laqad aḍallanī ʿani al-dhik'ri baʿda idh jāanī wakāna al-shayṭānu lil'insāni khadhūlan
